post_text: December 19, 2017 at 1:46 AM#1Making an auto create macro and so far my macro navigates to setup -> auto create -> preset -> ????The last part of the macro I'd like to deselect specific preset types. Anyone know the syntax to deselect a preset type while in the preset window?
